author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بِما جَعَلْتَهُ قَوِيًّا بِقُوَّتِكَ وَمُقْتَدِرًا بِسُلْطانِكَ بِحَيْثُ يَرَى ما سِواكَ كقَبْضَةٍ مِنَ التُّرابِ، وَأَحاطَتْهُ أَنْوارُ القِدَمِ عَلَى شأْنٍ لا يَرَى ما دُونَكَ إِلاَّ كَالع
translation: Praised be Thou that Thou hast so strengthened Him with Thy strength, and endowed Him by Thine almighty power with such potency, that aught save Thee is in His estimation but a handful of dust. The lights of unfading splendor have so enveloped Him that all else but Thee is in His eyes but a shadow.
